#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,n,p ;
    char a[100001] ;
    char b[100001] ;
    cin >> n ;
    int a1[26] ;
    int a2[26] ;
    while(n--) {
        memset(a1,0,sizeof(a1)) ;
        memset(a2,0,sizeof(a2)) ;

        cin >> a >> b ;
        int l1,l2 ;
        l1 = strlen(a) ;
        l2 = strlen(b) ;
        if(l1!=l2) {
            cout << "NO\n";
            continue ;
        }
        for(i=0;i<l1;i++) a1[a[i]-'a']++ ;
        for(i=0;i<l1;i++) a2[b[i]-'a']++ ;
        for(i=0;i<26;i++) if(a1[i] != a2[i]) break ;
        if(i == 26) cout << "YES\n" ;
        else cout << "NO\n" ;
    }
    return 0 ;
}
